snippet: Stan Wawrinka warmed up for his French Open title defense by winning the Geneva Open on Saturday, beating Marin Cilic 6-4, 7-6 (11) in the final....
lead_paragraph: Stan Wawrinka warmed up for his French Open title defense by winning the Geneva Open on Saturday, beating Marin Cilic 6-4, 7-6 (11) in the final.

headline.print_headline: Stan Wawrinka Beats Marin Cilic to Win Geneva Open Title
headline.main: Stan Wawrinka Beats Marin Cilic to Win Geneva Open Title
